publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7151 Fergus Ewing: The Bankruptcy (Certificate for Sequestration) (Scotland) Regulations 2010—That the Justice Committee recommends that the Bankruptcy (Certificate for Sequestration) (Scotland) Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill*
